messages.title: Working for you
messages.content:
1. A hard working local MP, who helps people right across the constituency.
2. An effective champion for our community, locally and at Westminster.
3. Mark believes only a strong economy can afford the public services we need, including the NHS.

issues.economy: Mark believes only a strong economy can afford the public services we need, including the NHS.
issues.health: Mark believes only a strong economy can afford the public services we need, including the NHS.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Polling day - May 7th 2015. Polls are open from 7.00am till 10.00pm.
